dataset.title: An annotated checklist of the Araceae, Leguminosae and Myrtaceae of the department of Boyacá, Colombia

abstract.para: Data support a taxonomic checklist for Araceae, Leguminosae and Myrtaceae from the department of Boyacá, Colombia.

intellectualRights.para: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (CC-BY) 4.0 License.

gbif.citation: Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew. An annotated checklist of the Araceae, Leguminosae and Myrtaceae of the department of Boyacá, Colombia. Occurrence dataset https://doi.org/10.15468/djysgc accessed via GBIF.org on 2022-02-08.
